CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 23, 1961, pg. A14 reads: "Spirit of Christmas - The true meaning of Christmas was expressed by members of Les Anotas Club, when they presented a gift to the Lemington Home for the Aged, last Sunday. The presentation was accepted by Mrs. Mildred Harris, executive director of the home, and Mrs. Lettie Harris, president of the Home Council.  Also shown in picture are Sheldon Lewis president of the club; Lenore Simpson, vice president; Ruth Washington, secretary; Pat Redmond, treasurer; Ella Mae Harris, Peggie Robinson, Niki Claybrook, Diane Nelson, Maxine Claybrook, Leslie Hill and Mrs. Elsie Meeks, sponsor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of Les Anotas Club members including: Sheldon Lewis, Lenore Simpson, Ruth Washington, Pat Redmond, Ella Mae Harris, Peggie Robinson, Niki Claybrook, Diane Nelson, Maxine Claybrook, Leslie Hill, and Elsie Meeks, presenting gift to Mildred Harris and Lettie Harris of the Lemington Home for the Aged, another version
CatSubject_tab: Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Lemington Home for the Aged (Pittsburgh Pa.)
